ygData.subject: Re: Maximals: Alliance or Predacon
ygData.msgSnippet: C ya tomorrow, Logo. ... Firearm sighs, watching Spears break down at the table and cry. He walks up to her, putting a hand on her shoulder. It ll be ok,

C ya tomorrow, Logo.

::Firearm::

Firearm sighs, watching Spears break down at the table and cry. He 
walks up to her, putting a hand on her shoulder.

"It'll be ok, we'll try to get him back. I promise."

He glances around the room, "If you want, I can give you something to 
ease the pain."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She looked at Firearm.  Tears were starting to well up in her 
> eyes. "No" she whispered.  She felt her spark breaking. She sat 
down 
> on the table and stared of into space. She shook her head as the 
> tears rolled down her cheeks. "No...no..no, he can't be gone. He 
just 
> can't be gone. Oh holy matrix, no, please no." She covered her face 
> with her hands and cried uncontrollably. From what she was told, 
her 
> love was lost to her, forever.
